scripts.build: ELEVENTY_PRODUCTION=true npx @11ty/eleventy && NODE_ENV=production npx tailwindcss -i src/_includes/css/tailwind.css -c tailwind.config.js -o build/css/style.css --minify
scripts.serve: npx @11ty/eleventy --serve & npx tailwindcss -i src/_includes/css/tailwind.css -c tailwind.config.js -o build/css/style.css --watch
